description:
Scan and flag conflicts between base template requirements and project customizations (e.g., incompatible tool versions, conflicting environment variables). Suggest resolutions automatically.

**Rationale:** Users might unknowingly create conflicting configurations between base and custom settings, leading to hard-to-debug container issues. Automated detection prevents these problems proactively.
title: Dependency conflict detection
